analysis.description:
TokenVault.claim (/unique_chucks/37/0x6b92deb0a212d4cec47d4c2ea60a4a9bab26a0af.sol) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- lockedAt == 0

TokenVault.claim (/unique_chucks/37/0x6b92deb0a212d4cec47d4c2ea60a4a9bab26a0af.sol) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- lockedAt == 0
TokenVault.getState (/unique_chucks/37/0x6b92deb0a212d4cec47d4c2ea60a4a9bab26a0af.sol) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- lockedAt == 0

TokenVault.recoverFailedLock (/unique_chucks/37/0x6b92deb0a212d4cec47d4c2ea60a4a9bab26a0af.sol#918-931) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(owner,token.balanceOf(address(this))) (/unique_chucks/37/0x6b92deb0a212d4cec47d4c2ea60a4a9bab26a0af.sol#928-931)

TokenVault.claim (/unique_chucks/37/0x6b92deb0a212d4cec47d4c2ea60a4a9bab26a0af.sol) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(investor,amount) (/unique_chucks/37/0x6b92deb0a212d4cec47d4c2ea60a4a9bab26a0af.sol)

Reentrancy in TokenVault.TokenVault (/unique_chucks/37/0x6b92deb0a212d4cec47d4c2ea60a4a9bab26a0af.sol#841-867):
	External calls:
	- ! token.isToken() (/unique_chucks/37/0x6b92deb0a212d4cec47d4c2ea60a4a9bab26a0af.sol#858)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- freezeEndsAt (/unique_chucks/37/0x6b92deb0a212d4cec47d4c2ea60a4a9bab26a0af.sol#861-863)
	- tokensToBeAllocated (/unique_chucks/37/0x6b92deb0a212d4cec47d4c2ea60a4a9bab26a0af.sol#863-867)
UpgradeAgent.originalSupply should be constant (/unique_chucks/37/0x6b92deb0a212d4cec47d4c2ea60a4a9bab26a0af.sol#265)
